description: IR Remote Button Mapping Configuration for Luma Mirror
note: Supports short press and long press (2 seconds) actions

KEY_EQUAL.description: Cycle through widgets in rearrange mode (EQ button)

simpleMediaRemote.description: Simple IR remote (like ELEGOO remote) - uses long press for BACK and CHANNEL functions

notes: Button names (e.g., KEY_POWER) come from LIRC and are defined in your remote's configuration file
Navigation: UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT for normal navigation and widget movement
Brightness controls: Use VOL+/VOL- buttons only
Back button: FUNC/STOP button (KEY_STOP) for going back/exiting submenus
Widget cycling: EQ button (KEY_EQUAL) to cycle through widgets in rearrange mode
To customize mappings for your specific remote, edit server/ir-remote-server.js and restart the IR server
The 'action' field must match one of the button actions in the Luma app (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, OK, BACK, POWER, BRIGHTNESS_UP, BRIGHTNESS_DOWN, WIDGET_CYCLE)
